level.heading: CONTRACT EXECUTION BY THE DISTRICT (ยง 27-1200)

level.text: Only a contracting officer is authorized to sign and enter into a contract on behalf of the District.
The contracting officer’s name and official title shall be typed or printed on the contract.
Ensure that the person signing on behalf of the contractor has the authority to bind the contractor; and
Sign the contract after it has been properly signed by the contractor.
